name: Infinite Platform
description:
"Huh.....? Where am I.......? Everything around me is white.......? There's no such thing like decorative background.......even rooms....or buildings.....it just plain white......."

Infinite Platform (I-Platform PJCT of UQ Labs Project)

You play as a black ghost found himself in the white background with nowhere to everywhere. No decorative background, no property building, no everything, it just plain white around him. You need to control as a black ghost to find the way out from his white plain dream, avoid any obstacle throughout the game, and reveal the final secret of the black ghost himself for what had he done.

Note

This is a paid version from Itch.io itself. In-app purchase from in-game apps is not available.

A free version from google play coming soon.

@I-Platform Project by PrayingMantis

FelixRichardAC@gmail.com
